Row.Text: Trade Routes originating from this city have a 30% increase in range and produce an additional 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when connecting to another civilization. Reduces [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Boredom.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Circus.

The Wine Cellar is a unique Zoo replacement for the Two Sicilies. It improves the range and [ICON_GOLD] Gold yield of both land and sea Trade Routes, in addition to reducing [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Boredom.

The Wine Cellar is a unique Menagerie replacement for the Two Sicilies. It improves the range and [ICON_GOLD] Gold yield of both land and sea Trade Routes, in addition to the [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness that it provides. City must have a Tavern.
Our people are now eating your triple-flavoured ice creams and cooking your home-made pizzas! We're worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.

The good education of our soldiers is the imperative of a functioning military. Let us then establish a military academy of the highest regard and, in doing so, safeguard the future of our country.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Two Sicilies [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the {1_EraName} Era [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Builds the Nunziatella Military Academy in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital

The good education of our soldiers is the imperative of a functioning military. Let us then establish a military academy of the highest regard and, in doing so, safeguard the future of our country.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Builds the Nunziatella Military Academy in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
Naval Units trained in this city earn promotions 30% faster.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only be acquired by the Two Sicilies through the "Establish the Nunziatella Military Academy" decision.

Nunziatella is one of the foremost military academies in the world. Founded in 1787, Naples, it is one of the oldest military schools still operating without interruption, and has produced innumerous alumni, many of whom high-ranking officers in the armed forces.

Our dependence upon agriculture shall soon be our undoing. The world is moving to the cities, and we must ensure that our people are not left behind.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be the Two-Sicilies [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Industrialization [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities of {1_Num} or below [ICON_CITIZEN] Population lose 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities of {1_Num} or above [ICON_CITIZEN] Population gain +2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with the number of cities

Our dependence upon agriculture shall soon be our undoing. The world is moving to the cities, and we must ensure that our people are not left behind.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population in high-Pop cities
Citizens have begun to move away from the countryside and into the cities in {1_CivName}.
A new cuisine made with thin pasta strips, minced beef, and sun dried tomatoes has been invented in the city of {1_City}! They call this dish: spaghetti bolognaise!

A noble visitor, Margherita of Savoy, has requested that we serve her one of our famous dishes. She complains that her regular meals are drab and unfashionable, and requests only the finest that the Two Sicilies has to offer.[NEWLINE]
She shall be most pleased to try our anchovy Pizzas.
The Lady shall positively delight in a garlic Pizza.
Perhaps she has the appetite for a Pizza of mozzarella, basil, and tomatoes?
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]20% chance that you will gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]50% chance that you will gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]70% chance that you will gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have fed the noble Margherita on an anchovy Pizza. She deplored it vehemently.
We have fed the noble Margherita on an anchovy Pizza. She delighted in it, and the pizza shall be henceforth known as the Margherita Pizza.
We have fed the noble Margherita on a garlic Pizza. She deplored it vehemently.
We have fed the noble Margherita on a garlic Pizza. She delighted in it, and the pizza shall be henceforth known as the Margherita Pizza.
We have fed the noble Margherita on a mozzarella, basil, and tomato Pizza. She deplored it vehemently.
We have fed the noble Margherita on a mozzarella, basil, and tomato Pizza. She delighted in it, and the pizza shall be henceforth known as the Margherita Pizza.

Criminal operations led by the "Cosa Noctra," or the Mafia, have recently been on the rise. The recent death of an outspoken politician in {1_City} points to their involvement. People are beginning to question our complacency on the issue.[NEWLINE]
This cannot be tolerated. They must be jailed.
We would rather leave them be.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_City} goes into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance for 2 turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_City} begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 15 turns[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{2_City} goes into [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance for 2 turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Permanently increases the threshold for [ICON_JFD_ORGANIZED_CRIME] Organized Crime by +10%.[ENDCOLOR]
We have purged Mafia operations in {1_CityName}.
We have decided to turn a blind eye to Mafia operations in {1_CityName}.
